挺.definition: straight; erect; to stick out (a part of the body); to (physically) straighten up; to support; to withstand; outstanding; (coll.) quite; very; classifier for machine guns

挺住.definition: to stand firm; to stand one's ground (in the face of adversity or pain)

挺屍.definition: (lit.) to lie stiff like a corpse; (coll.) to sleep

挺直.definition: upright; erect; to straighten up (one's back etc); to hold erect

挺立.definition: to stand erect; to stand upright

挺而走險.definition: variant of 鋌而走險|铤而走险[ting3 er2 zou3 xian3]

挺腰.definition: to straighten one's back; to arch one's back
